product_name: The North Face Mountain Light Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Mountain Light men's jacket is lightweight and durable, and provides high-performance comfort. It's ideal for light mountaineering, backpacking and skiing. 2-layer Gore-Tex(R) Performance polyester shell is waterproof, windproof and breathable; all seams are sealed for complete protection. Free-hanging taffeta lining enhances moisture movement and warmth. Fully adjustable, removable drop hood features a tall zip-up collar that offers lower-face protection against harsh weather; brushed collar lining is kind to skin. Front zipper features double stormflaps to keep the weather out. Self-fabric adjustable cuffs tabs and drawcord hem. The North Face Mountain Light jacket has zippered hand pockets that double as core vents and a chest pocket; includes an internal security pocket and stretch mesh pocket. Standard fit ensures freedom of motion. Integration feature lets you zip in compatible The North Face mid-layer insulating pieces.
short_description: The North Face Mountain Light men's jacket is lightweight and durable, and provides high-performance comfort. It's ideal for light mountaineering, backpacking and skiing.
